experience.description: Engineering student at Mines Nancy - French equivalent Master's Degree - Major in Energy (3.71 / 4 GPA) From 2022 - after a two-year undergraduate programme at Lycée Kléber in Strasbourg (France) prior to the highly selective entrance examination to prestigious French engineering schools - Nancy (France)
Producer worker (training period) - Karl Schöngen KG Kunststoff-Rohrsysteme February 2023 - Salzgitter (Germany)

achievements: Key courses: Fluid Mechanics, Thermodynamics, Economics, Data Analysis, Deep Learning German-speaking section (History classes in German at SciencesPo Nancy, France)
summary: As a student engineer on a Master's degree at Mines Nancy, majoring in energy, I'm keen to join your company for an 8-12 week training period requiring skilful teamwork on a complex project. Furthermore, I am capable of adapting to work in any appropriate team as I possess the tools to learn fast and improve.
